body.p: In response to the cost-benefit concerns raised by stakeholders, the FASB decided to amend Topic 606 to:

li.p: permit an entity, as an accounting policy election, to account for shipping and handling activities that occur after the customer has obtained control of a good as fulfilment activities; and
explicitly state that shipping and handling activities that occur before the customer obtains control of the related good are fulfilment activities.
